homeBanner.heading: Work in Surfinite browser without the threat of blocking
homeBanner.subTitle: Control multiple accounts in search engines, advertising cabinets and social networks at the same time
homeBanner.roles: Distribution of roles and rights for teams

howTo.heading: Surfinite is safe for work
howTo.subTitle: Surfinite is a platform for the hidden formation of hundreds of accounts. Your IP address and browser fingerprint are set for each profile individually. Risk of bans and restrictions is reduced to zero

cta.line1: Many accounts simulate network access from different computers
cta.line2: And you get complete anonymity with a guarantee of confidentiality to log in to any site

earnWithoutBarriers.heading: Earn online without barriers
earnWithoutBarriers.subTitle: Surfinite is an all-in-one tool that makes your job easier and increases your income. Forget about account locks and restrictions for earnings. Use the browser in different spheres!
earnWithoutBarriers.subTitle2: Individual digital prints isolate profiles from each other and allow you to work freely on the network.

card1.title: Affinity marketing
card1.subTitle: Use of different browser profiles, automation of data collection, management tools and development algorithms

card2.title: Sports betting
card2.subTitle: Creating an incognito profile and multi-accounts for hiding from bookmakers.

hideFingerprint.heading: Hide your fingerprint
hideFingerprint.subTitle: Fingerprint is information collected about a remote device for further identification, fingerprinting is the collection of this information. Fingerprints can be used in whole or in part for identification purposes even when cookies are disabled.
hideFingerprint.subTitle2: A hidden fingerprint occurs as a hidden request to a client machine. These methods are based on a precise classification of client parameters such as TCP/IP configuration, OS fingerprint, IEEE 802.11 (WiFi) settings, and time offset.

beforeAndAfter.heading: Before and After: Surfinite Convenience
beforeAndAfter.subTitle: With Surfinite, you automatically collect cookies in your browser profile, store logins and passwords for websites, install browser extensions without restrictions.
beforeAndAfter.beforeText: You had to enter many emails to create accounts, accounts got banned, you registered again and again, worked on several computers at once - it was inconvenient, the workflow was slow
beforeAndAfter.afterText: With just a few clicks, you can create hundreds of accounts on one computer, work safely and calmly. Surfinite hides your data. You automate business processes without risks and hassles

virtualAccounts.heading: Use Virtual Accounts for 200+ Services!
virtualAccounts.subTitle: our actions in any services will remain unnoticed. Now you manage accounts without restrictions and data tracking platforms. Surfinite allows you to work with a whole list of services:

card1.title: Ad Networks
card1.text: Arbitration and farming accounts for advertising and traffic collection

card2.title: Bookmakers
card2.text: Surfinite will help wherever more than 1 account is required.

card3.title: Marketplaces
card3.text: Registration and maintenance of 10-20 or more accounts with ads in any cities and headings.

ourPros.heading: 6 Benefits of Surfinite
ourPros.subTitle: Your actions in any services will remain unnoticed. Now you manage accounts without restrictions and data tracking platforms. Surfinite allows you to work with a whole list of services:

card1.title: Bypass checks
card1.subTitle: Each profile has unique IP, User Agent, Language, TimeZone, Screen Size, Video Card and other parameters.

card2.title: Teamwork
card2.subTitle: You easily work in a group and automate business processes. Control access to profiles, configure permissions for more comfortable synchronization.

card3.title: Data Sync
card3.subTitle: Your cookies, tabs and all your browsing data remain in the profiles.

card4.title: Checking ads
card4.subTitle: Manage targeting and place ads imitating users from different cities and countries, remove incorrect links.

card5.title: Retail price comparison
card5.subTitle: Check the cost of goods through the eyes of all users, as the seller sets prices depending on the location of the buyers.

card6.title: API and Automation
card6.subTitle: We've implemented APIs for developers, as well as automations for Selenium. Automate any repetitive tasks with our browser.

betaBanner.heading: Sign up for a free beta before
betaBanner.subTitle: For the trial period, we give everyone the opportunity to try out the beta version of the Surfinite anti-detection browser for free!

faq.q1: Is it possible to run several profiles at the same time and work on them?
faq.a1: Yes. The browser allows you to run multiple profiles at the same time.
faq.q2: What operating systems (OS) does your browser run on?
faq.a2: The browser works on all popular operating systems: Windows, Linux, macOS (including M1 processors)
faq.q3: Can I use the same account on 2 or more devices?
faq.a3: Multiple members can be added under the same account, and can also log in in different browsers.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: You can pay for a subscription using cryptocurrencies, bank cards, Paypal, Qiwi and other payment systems
faq.q5: What settings can be configured in the browser?
faq.a5: You can configure almost all available options.
faq.q6: What guarantees that the account will not be banned? How exactly do you change your digital fingerprint?
faq.a6: Nobody can give 100% guarantees, but we ourselves actively use our browser for different purposes and can confirm the highest degree of anonymity.
faq.q7: How often do you update your browser? Do you consider the wishes of users when updating?
faq.a7: The browser is constantly evolving. We thoroughly analyze all the wishes of customers. We immediately take the top ones into work.

registration.heading: Sign-up
